original: Notes: This volume is no. 32 of the K.S.T.S. series but it was incorrectly printed as volume 31 on both the english and sanskrit title pages. In one specimen examined the volume no. had been altered by hand (possibly by the printers or publishers) to the correct volume number (i.e. 32) but in another specimen examined it had not been corrected. analyzed: layākale hi svam rūpam jāgrat tad pūrva vṛtti tu

ekatra api prabhau pūrṇe cit turya atītam ucyate
ānandaḥ turyam icchā eva bīja bhūmiḥ suṣupta tā

original: jñānaṃ tu svapnavṛttitvaṃ kriyā jāgraditi smṛtā |
analyzed: jñānam tu svapna vṛtti tvam kriyā jāgrat iti smṛtā
atra eva yoga bhūmi utthāḥ saṃjñāḥ piṇḍa stha tā ādayaḥ
sarvatobhadra tā ādyāḥ tu prasaṃkhyā jñāni nirmitāḥ
eka ekatra catur rūpa sadbhāvāt vitate tatas
catur rūpa tvam ekatra tri tvam paścāt atha ekatā
ekaḥ tu bhairavaḥ nāthaḥ prollasat viśva rūpakaḥ
ekaḥ śiva ādi sakala paryanta sthiti saṃgataḥ
saḥ ayam samastaḥ eva adhvā bhairavāḥ bheda vṛttimān
tad svātantryāt svatantra tvam aśnuvānā uvabhāsate
saḥ uyam mātṛ svarūpa sthaḥ mantrādhvā iti vibhāvyate
pramā rūpa tayā sā uyam varṇādhvā iti nirucyate
pramāṇa rūpa tām etya prayāti eṣa padādhva tām

gacchan saṃkalpanā yogāt kalā adhvā mātṛ saṃgataḥ
śuddhe prameya tā yoge sa tattvādhvā iti gṛhyatām

āmṛśantaḥ pramā rūpām satyām bibhrati saṃvidam

original: tatrāpi khalu saṃkete bālo vyutpādyatāṃ kutaḥ ||1026||

original: ata eva hi vāksiddhau varṇānāṃ samupāsyatā |

original: viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsante na bhāvyante'pi te tathā ||1040||
analyzed: viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsante na bhāvyante ipi te tathā

nagara arṇava śaila ādyāḥ tad icchā anuvidhāyinaḥ
na svayam sat asat rūpa kāraṇa akāraṇa ātmakāḥ
cira prarūḍhe niyame samucchedāt pravartanāt
a rūḍha ipi svatantraḥ yam sthitaḥ cit vyoma bhairavaḥ
evam asmi iti an āmarśaḥ bhedakaḥ bhāva maṇḍale
sarva pramāṇaiḥ no siddham svapne kartṛ antaram yathā
sva saṃvidaḥ svatantrāyāḥ tathā sargaḥ upi budhyatām

aham eva sthitaḥ bhāvaiḥ bhūtaiḥ cit mātrakaiḥ iti
evam jātaḥ mṛtaḥ asmi iti janma mṛtyu vicitra tāḥ
a janmani a mṛtau bhānti citta bhittau sva kalpitāḥ
para iha saṃvidā mātram para loka iha loka tā
kintu akāla kalā saṃvid deśa bhede pi abhedinī
abhaviṣyat ayam sargaḥ mūrtaḥ ced na tu cit mayaḥ
tat avekṣyata avakṣyata iti pāṭhaḥ tad madhyāt kena ekaḥ api dharādharaḥ
bhūta tanmātra varga ādeḥ ādhāra ādheya carcane
ante saṃvid mayī śaktiḥ śiva rūpā eva dhāriṇī

original: atra svātmani te tena śaktiḥ sādhārasaṃjñitā ||1051||

original: ata eva kṣaṇaṃ nāma na kiñcidapi manmahe |

original: prāṇe khe citi bāhye vā kutrāpīdamiti bhramaḥ |

original: akṛtaṃ ca yathā svapne mayā kṛtamiti sphuret |

original: yā ca (yasya) saṃvitsvayaṃ tādṛkphalagarbhā na jāyate |

bhuṅkte svar naraka ādyān tu bhogān svātantrya kalpitān

original: vettyanyena na dṛśyastu sa tvanyānveda cānyathā |

analyzed: bandhaḥ mokṣaḥ sukham svayam iti pāṭhaḥ svargaḥ duḥkham jaḍa mayī

śubhāya bhavītu
śrīmat pratāpa bhūbhartuḥ ājñayā prītaye satām
madhusūdana kaulena saṃpādya idam prakāśitam
